EmailTemplate.description: This email template will be sent to the scheduler when the remaining balance for Text & Phone Reminders is less than or equal to zero dollars.
EmailTemplate.name: Remaining Balance is less than or equal to zero
EmailTemplate.subject: WARNING: SUMO Notifications are deactivated due to insufficiant funds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!forcebrain__Billing__c.Name},
Your remaining balance for your SUMO Text and Phone Notifications is below $0. SUMO will no longer send text and Phone reminders.
You may purchase more credits in the SUMO App.
1. Click on the + on the far right of the tab menu. 2. Click on SUMO Settings. 3. Click on the Text & Phone Settings. 4. Click on the Payment tab. 5. Complete the form to add funds.
Alternatively, you may contact your ForceBrain.com representative immediately to purchase more credits.
Thank you, SUMO Support 800-708-1790
